Source.name: EBS Sensor: ATG WF Workflow Background Process is scheduled for deferred activities for all item types - Weekly
Source.DisplayName: EBS Sensor: ATG WF Workflow Background Process is scheduled for deferred activities for all item types - Weekly
Source.Description: Workflow Background Process is scheduled for deferred activities for all item types

DBPattern.SQLQuery: select 'ME$EBS_ATG_WF_BACKGROUND_PROCESS_DEFERRED1' sensor, to_timestamp(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') entrytime, 'issue_message:' || s.issue_message key_data FROM (select msg issue_message from ( select 'WF Background Engine not scheduled for ALL deferred activities' msg from dual where not exists ( select p.USER_CONCURRENT_PROGRAM_NAME PROGRAM_NAME, r.ARGUMENT_TEXT ARGUMENTS, r.RESUBMIT_INTERVAL EVERY, r.RESUBMIT_INTERVAL_UNIT_CODE SO_OFTEN FROM apps.fnd_concurrent_requests r, apps.FND_CONCURRENT_PROGRAMS_TL p, apps.fnd_concurrent_programs c WHERE r.CONCURRENT_PROGRAM_ID = p.CONCURRENT_PROGRAM_ID and p.CONCURRENT_PROGRAM_ID = c.CONCURRENT_PROGRAM_ID and c.CONCURRENT_PROGRAM_NAME = 'FNDWFBG' AND p.language = 'US' and r.ACTUAL_COMPLETION_DATE is null and r.PHASE_CODE in ('P','R') and substr(r.ARGUMENT_TEXT,0,instr(r.ARGUMENT_TEXT,',')-1) is NULL and upper(TRIM(substr(r.ARGUMENT_TEXT,instr(r.ARGUMENT_TEXT,',',1,3)+1,(instr(r.ARGUMENT_TEXT,',',1,4)-1)-(instr(r.ARGUMENT_TEXT,',',1,3))))) in ('YES','Y') and rownum < 2 ))) s
